(36462, 39610).name: climate change
(36462, 39610).label: natural hazard
(36462, 39610).description: A long-term change in the Earth's climate, resulting from natural and human-induced factors, with significant impacts on ecosystems and human societies

(36462, 39610).name: extreme climate events

(36462, 39610).name: riparian zones
(36462, 39610).label: location
(36462, 39610).description: Areas of land adjacent to rivers, streams, or other bodies of water, often characterized by unique ecosystems and biodiversity

(36462, 39610).name: urban areas
(36462, 39610).label: location
(36462, 39610).description: Areas of high population density, characterized by human-dominated landscapes and infrastructure

(39053, 42145).name: hot night temperatures

(39053, 42145).name: heavy rainfall events

(39053, 42145).name: climate change
(39053, 42145).label: teleconnection
